sqlQuery.name: all_taxa_count
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count(*) FROM apidb.OrthomclTaxon WHERE is_species != 0

sqlQuery.name: all_sequences_count
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count(eas.aa_sequence_id) FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE ot.taxon_id = eas.taxon_id AND ot.is_species != 0

sqlQuery.name: all_groups_count
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT count(*) FROM ApiDB.OrthologGroup

sqlQuery.name: all_taxa_info
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT orthomcl_taxon_id AS taxon_id, nvl(parent_id, orthomcl_taxon_id) AS parent_id, three_letter_abbrev AS abbrev, name, is_species, order_num AS sort_index FROM apidb.OrthomclTaxon ORDER BY parent_id ASC, order_num ASC

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_history_seq
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.source_id, og.name, ot.name FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE ot.taxon_id = eas.taxon_id AND eas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id(+) AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = og.ortholog_group_id(+) AND eas.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_per_seq
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequences_per_grp
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.aa_sequence_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: groups_like_seq_descrip_keyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND eas.description LIKE '%$querycode%' GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_pfam_accession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND db.primary_identifier = '$querycode' GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: groups_like_pfam_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND db.secondary_identifier LIKE '%$querycode%' GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: groups_like_pfam_description
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND db.remark LIKE '%$querycode%' GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_num_seqs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE og.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND og.number_of_members $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_num_species
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas WHERE ogs.ortholog_group_id != 0 AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id GROUP BY ogs.ortholog_group_id HAVING count(DISTINCT(eas.taxon_id)) $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_num_match_pairs
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.ortholog_group_id, og.number_of_match_pairs AS matchpair FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE 100 * og.number_of_match_pairs * 2 / (og.number_of_members * (og.number_of_members - 1)) $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_percent_identity
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE avg_percent_identity $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_percent_match
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE avg_percent_match $number

sqlQuery.name: groups_by_blast_evalue
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE avg_evalue_mant * power(10, avg_evalue_exp) $number

sqlQuery.name: group_attributes_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id, name, 0 AS avg_dcs, avg_percent_identity, avg_percent_match, (avg_evalue_mant * power(10, avg_evalue_exp)) AS evalue, number_of_match_pairs, number_of_members FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: taxa_num_genes_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT * FROM apidb.GroupTaxonMatrix WHERE ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: keywords_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogk.keyword, ogk.frequency FROM apidb.OrthomclGroupKeyword ogk WHERE ogk.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_domains_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.aa_sequence_id, dbaf.db_ref_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: description_per_domain
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT remark FROM sres.DbRef WHERE db_ref_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_attributes_per_group
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.source_id, eas.name, eas.description, eas.length, ot.name, edr.id_url, ot.three_letter_abbrev FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id AND eas.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_per_source_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence WHERE source_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_like_id_and_descrip_keyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence WHERE source_id LIKE '%$querycode%' OR description LIKE '%$querycode%'

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_like_descrip_keyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT aa_sequence_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence WHERE description LIKE '%$querycode%'

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_by_three_letter_abbrev
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND ot.three_letter_abbrev = '$querycode'

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_by_pfam_accession
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT df.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND db.primary_identifier = '$querycode'

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_like_pfam_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND db.secondary_identifier LIKE '%$querycode%'

sqlQuery.name: sequence_id_like_pfam_keyword
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.aa_sequence_id FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND db.remark LIKE '%$querycode%'

sqlQuery.name: group_name_by_sequence_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT og.name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id=$seq_id

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_sequence_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.source_id, eas.secondary_identifier, eas.description, eas.length, ot.name, edr.id_url, og.name, og.ortholog_group_id, ot.three_letter_abbrev FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot, apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE eas.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND eas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id(+) AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = og.ortholog_group_id(+) AND eas.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_name_per_group_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_id_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ortholog_group_id FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE name = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_group_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.aa_sequence_id, eas.source_id, eas.description, eas.length, ot.three_letter_abbrev FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id AND eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: max_length_per_group_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT MAX(eas.length) FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id AND eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: domains_info_per_sequence_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.source_id, db.primary_identifier, db.secondary_identifier, db.remark, al.start_min, al.end_max FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, dots.AaLocation al, sres.DbRef db WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND eas.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_source_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.source_id, edr.id_url, ot.name, og.name, eas.description, eas.length, eas.secondary_identifier, eas.sequence FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot, sres.ExternalDatabaseRelease edr, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, apidb.OrthologGroup og WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND og.ortholog_group_id(+) = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND eas.external_database_release_id = edr.external_database_release_id AND eas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id(+) AND ot.three_letter_abbrev = ? AND eas.source_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: domain_arch_per_sequence_source_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT al.start_min, al.end_max, db.primary_identifier, db.secondary_identifier, db.remark FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot, dots.DomainFeature df, dots.AaLocation al, dots.DbRefAaFeature dbaf, sres.DbRef db WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = df.aa_sequence_id AND df.aa_feature_id = al.aa_feature_id AND df.aa_feature_id = dbaf.aa_feature_id AND dbaf.db_ref_id = db.db_ref_id AND eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND ot.three_letter_abbrev = ? AND eas.source_id = ? ORDER BY al.start_min ASC, al.end_max DESC

sqlQuery.name: species_details
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ot.taxon_id, ot.name, ot.three_letter_abbrev, od.resource_name, od.resource_url, od.description FROM apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot, apidb.OrthomclResource od WHERE od.orthomcl_taxon_id = ot.orthomcl_taxon_id AND ot.is_species != 0

sqlQuery.name: num_sequences_per_species
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM dots.ExternalAASequence WHERE taxon_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: num_clustered_sequences_per_species
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT COUNT(ogs.aa_sequence_id) FROM dots.ExternalAASequence eas, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id AND eas.taxon_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: num_groups_per_species
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(ogs.ortholog_group_id)) FROM dots.ExternalAASequence eas, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs WHERE eas.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id AND eas.taxon_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: msa_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT multiple_sequence_alignment FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE name = ?

sqlQuery.name: svg_content_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT svg_content FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE name = ?

sqlQuery.name: biolayout_image_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT biolayout_image FROM apidb.OrthologGroup WHERE name = ?

sqlQuery.name: sequence_info_per_group_name
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.source_id, eas.description, ot.name, eas.length, eas.sequence, ot.three_letter_abbrev FROM apidb.OrthologGroup og, apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE og.ortholog_group_id = ogs.ortholog_group_id AND ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id AND eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND og.name = ?

sqlQuery.name: domain_sequence_info_per_group_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.aa_sequence_id, eas.source_id, eas.description, eas.length, ot.three_letter_abbrev FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = eas.aa_sequence_id AND eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND ogs.ortholog_group_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: history_sequence_info_per_sequence_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT eas.source_id, eas.description, ot.name, eas.length, eas.sequence, ot.three_letter_abbrev FROM dots.ExternalAaSequence eas, apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot WHERE eas.taxon_id = ot.taxon_id AND eas.aa_sequence_id = ?

sqlQuery.name: group_id_per_sequence_id
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT ogs.aa_sequence_id, ogs.ortholog_group_id, t.three_letter_abbrev FROM apidb.OrthologGroupAaSequence ogs, dots.externalaasequence s, apidb.OrthomclTaxon t WHERE ogs.aa_sequence_id = ? AND s.aa_sequence_id = ogs.aa_sequence_id AND t.taxon_id = s.taxon_id
